View Dependent Progressive Meshes

The VDPM software is based on "Truly Selective Refinement of Progressive Meshes", J. Kim and S. Lee, In Proc. Graphics Interface 2001.

The library is located in OpenMesh/Tools/VDPM/ and in OpenMesh/Apps/VDProgMesh/ are demo applications:

  1. mkbalancedpm creates balanced progressive meshes
  2. vdpmanalyzer takes a progressive mesh and generates a view dependent progressive mesh.
  3. vdpmsynthezier is viewer for vdpm meshes.
